notifyee-email-template.subject: Hygiene Policy Sample Report
notifyee-email-template.body:
These workloads are flagged as dormant

To avoid repeated notification:

  • for each application execute a cf restage or cf delete
  • for each service instance execute a cf update-service or cf delete-service

depending on whether or not you want to keep the workload running.
